name: Marsmare: Alienation
overview: Have you ever thought if there is life on Mars? Our hero didn’t believe in the existence of extraterrestrials. But one quiet July night he has found himself in the company of not so friendly aliens. Now he has to fight with different inhabitants of Mars and find a way back home. Marsmare: Alienation is a platformer with elements of metroidvania. 90 rooms, 8 enemy types, 5 different locations (laboratory, caves, factory, spaceport and Mars surface), checkpoints and other great features.
